Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: Bounty Hunters 13 is the thirteenth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Bounty Hunters. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli and Arif Prianto, and published by Marvel Comics on June 9, 2021. It features the story "Showdown on Smuggler's Moon," in which Beilert Valance and Dengar encounter Chewbacca on Nar Shaddaa.

THE WOOKIEE ALWAYS WINS! Hot on the trail of BOBA FETT, VALANCE and DENGAR run into a rather large obstacle—the mighty CHEWBACCA! Will T'ONGA escape the trap set by a mysterious organization out to upend the underworld? And who is the figure in the shadows hunting them all?!
